channel.title: Tops on Zeya Xue
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Zeya Xue

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Zhengyao (Zeya) Xue. 中文名是薛正遥。I am currently a PhD candidate at University of California Davis. I got my BS from Nanjing University, China. You can find more about more work at the publications page.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Google Scholar Profile 2019 Kable, Mary E., Yanin Srisengfa, Zhengyao Xue, Laurynne C. Coates, and Maria L. Marco. “Viable and total bacterial populations undergo equipment-and time-dependent shifts during milk processing.” Appl. Environ. Microbiol. (2019): AEM-00270.DOI: 10.1128/AEM.00270-19 Appelt, Sandra, Sharif S. Aly, Karen Tonooka, Kathy Glenn, Zhengyao Xue, Terry W. Lehenbauer, and Maria L. Marco. Development and comparison of loop-mediated isothermal amplification and quantitative polymerase chain reaction assays for the detection of Mycoplasma bovis in milk.
